message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on a fantastic product. I think you'll love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120 again?
